line.comment: * Make sure we are strong enough before interrupting our current task, if any.
* Sector is hot: retreat if necessary.
* Sector is safe: send to repair damaged ships, or send to inspection if needed.
* Support ships have their own system. See Mayhem.Task.Support.

sval.val: Make sure we are strong enough before interrupting our current task, if any.
Sector is hot: retreat if necessary.
Sector is safe: send to repair damaged ships, or send to inspection if needed.
Support ships have their own system. See Mayhem.Task.Support.
